description: This is an all-day hike if you want to stop often to take pictures as we did. The trail climbs approximately 640 meters (2100 ft) to Becker Lake at times following access roads. The views are spectacular of Vernon and the North Okanagan and Kalamalka Lakes. Take your time and enjoy!
directions: Take Hartnell Road East 0.3 km past Dixon Dam Road. Trailhead is on you right at the first sharp left corner.
title: Becker Lake
